Name: Elderflower Collins
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of elderflowers or gypsophila (baby's breath) or lemon slice wheel.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.
Garnish with elderflowers or gypsophila (baby's breath) or lemon slice wheel.
Review: A hint of elderflower adds interest to the classic Collins cocktail - long, balanced and refreshing.
History: See the history of the Collins cocktail on our Tom Collins page.
Nutrition: One serving of Elderflower Collins contains 196 calories
